agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Redistricting TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM, Thursday, March 7, 2019 PLACE: JHR 140 CHAIR: Rep. Phil King The committee will hold an organizational hearing on the topic "Redistricting Requirements and Demographic Trends" with invited testimony. An agenda will be available at the hearing. *Invited Testimony Only NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
